original: bkra shis gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
analyzed: bkra shis gang jig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku

original: gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spangs pa'i //
analyzed: gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spong ba

analyzed: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog
